song_lyrics: Have chhoḍu nā sāth kadī āpano...
Samaju nā dekhu kāī savaḷu je hoy te,
(Swāmī) jāṇī potānī mune vahāl kare, have...
Agaṇit swabhāv sau chhalakīne dukh daī,
(Mārā) avaguṇ joyā nahi lesh kadī, have...
Jīvanī avaḷāī evī samaje na mūke kaī ,
Hete samajāvī mune māf karī, have...
Bhaṭakī hatī hu to janamo janamthī,
Mahant Swāmīe karī nyāl mune āj,
Pragaṭ prabhue karī nyāl mune, have...
title: Karuṇā karīne Swāmī hāth zālyo

metadata.kirtan_info:
2-1169: Sadhu Santpurushdas

Category: Mahant Swami Maharajna Pad
